name: Attack Of Poopy Zombies V-1.6
description:
UPDATE V-1.6 - Fixed movement and made the game look alot better,  Improved both maps and added new pois, added better sliding for speed , New ui and more!!!

Set in the universe where everyone is well poop, you are a team that is set to kill the viruses that have  overran the area and research them.  There are many variants including- Corn, Wet , Fire and more! Either die and have to restart or go as long as you can.

Controls - w,a,s,d to move . Scroll wheel up & down or number keys -to switch weapons. Ctrl to slide and Space to jump
